definition: to set foot in/to tread (in or on)/to walk into
to tread/to stamp/to step on/to press a pedal/to investigate on the spot
to go forward/to advance/to go in/to enter/to put in/to submit/to take in/to admit/(math.) base of a number system/classifier for sections in a building or residential compound

sentences.english: The challenger showed the white feather as soon as he stepped into the ring with the champion.
sentences.chinese: 這位挑戰者同冠軍一踏進拳擊場時就膽怯了。

sentences.english: I noticed when I took my first step inside . I bumped my head on the doorframe .
sentences.chinese: 我剛踏進第一步時就領教了，我一頭撞在了門框上。

sentences.english: The student got stage fright when he stepped into the exam room.
sentences.chinese: 學生一踏進考試室就有點怯場。

sentences.english: And when Mr. Clinton visits a restaurant, everybody in the room knows it.
sentences.chinese: 只要克林頓一踏進餐廳，所有的食客就能立即認出他。

sentences.english: Jean Valjean felt the pavement vanishing beneath his feet. He entered this slime.
sentences.chinese: 冉阿讓感到溝道在腳下陷落了，他踏進了泥漿。

sentences.english: You will BE immersed in the everlasting brightness as soon as you step into this jewellery shop.
sentences.chinese: 踏進本金銀珠寶店，您就置身在永遠的光輝之中。

sentences.english: Dinin took a deep breath and gingerly stepped to the archway.
sentences.chinese: 狄寧深吸一口氣，小心翼翼地踏進拱門。

sentences.english: It's been two years that I didn't come back to the campus of SIAS.
sentences.chinese: 已經兩年沒有再次踏進西亞斯的校門了。

sentences.english: This night, is the final step into a los with the threshold of the book or the sea.
sentences.chinese: 這一晚，是京洛最終一次踏進琴海書寓的門檻。

sentences.english: First day just crossed, as soon as spring then treadonned the rabbit year threshold.
sentences.chinese: 初一剛過，春天便一腳踏進了兔年的門檻。

sentences.english: Since then I have never set foot again in that champak-shaded villa garden.
sentences.chinese: 從那時起，我再也沒有踏進那個黃蘭花蔭的別墅花園。

sentences.english: He entered society, gave the day over to merrymaking and wallow in among them.
sentences.chinese: 他踏進社會，尋歡作樂，沉湎其中。

sentences.english: And we can safely bet he never set foot in a McDonald's.
sentences.chinese: 我敢放心的打賭他絕不會踏進麥當勞了。

sentences.english: Lightly smile, he trod into studio.
When Rodger came into the house, he was very surprise to see water all over the house.
sentences.chinese: 當羅傑踏進家門，他驚奇地發現屋子裏一地是水。

sentences.english: As late as 1999 walking through Yun Yang was like travelling back in time.
sentences.chinese: 在1999年之前，走近雲陽村就像踏進時光隧道。
